items.content_html: Discord.js MVC Microframework is a lightweight and user-friendly framework for building Discord.js bots using the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern. It provides a structured approach to bot development, making it easier to organize your code and understand the flow of data.
items.title: 3h04m1/discord.js-mvc: Discord.js MVC Microframework is a lightweight and user-friendly framework for building Discord.js bots using the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern. It provides a structured approach to bot development, making it easier to organize your code and understand the flow of data.
